name: Chonka
storyline:
Become obese/libertarian/elite. 
 
Play as Chonka, a young cat trying to break into a raw cookie dough factory! he's gonna eat all their cookie dough n shieeeet. You have to fight enemies also looking for cookie dough. Many levels and bosses, different routes/endings. just like undertale. Chonka has quasi-ironic humour & controller support!
